result.reason: Long-standing VncSharpCore library bug causing random VNC disconnects, confirmed by 15+ users across multiple VNC servers; the ProtocolVNC wrapper lacks keepalive/reconnect logic and the underlying library has stability issues during high screen activity
result.approach: Add auto-reconnect logic in VNCEvent_Disconnected (retry with backoff, configurable max retries) and investigate adding VNC keepalive/framebuffer update requests on a timer to prevent idle disconnects; if VncSharpCore itself is the root cause, consider replacing with a maintained fork or MarcusWicworking VncSharp

attempts.raw_output:
